dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset is a large-scale dataset mainly designed for street scenes understanding. It contains 5,000 finely annotated images and more than 20,000 coarsely annotated images collected from 50 different cities, focusing on the semantic segmentation task with 19 classes.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes
